title: Let’s Go On a Pioneering Journey!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>It’s a rabbit cake! So cute~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You know of a pretty nice cafe, You-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ehehe~, yeah! Or so I would like to say, but someone told me about this place.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Is that so, who told you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You see, on the school idol channel, I asked people to tell me some delicious places because I’m going to go to Tokyo next holiday, so they taught me about this place. The sweets are great, but they recommend the curry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The curry.... Ah, it must be this one, right! Waah, it’s a half and half curry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It says that they use angel shrimps.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s it! They told me that that shrimp is sweet and delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You got to know a pretty amazing place, huh.... I also want to tell the people who support me about other great places!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Me too! Hey, why don’t we go cafe hopping after this? Let’s go find some lovely places too~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
